name: Copy Web to online_preview

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - DEV

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Perform Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Deploy
      uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
      with:
        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        publish_dir: ./flutter_learning_playground/web
        publish_branch: online_preview
